description: Evaluate one of two different values depending on test condition.

parameters.description: If true, parameter 'then' is evaluated for result. If false, parameter 'else' is evaluated.
parameters.name: condition

parameters.description: This is the body of a structured block that is evaluated if 'condition' is true. See the 'body' parameter of the 'block' function for information on how the body is processed.
parameters.name: then

parameters.description: This is the body of a structured block that is evaluated if 'condition' is false. If not specified and condition is false, a null value is returned. See the 'body' parameter of the 'block' function for information on how the body is processed.
parameters.name: else
